nodes.text: Creatures of KOTOR 2: Horned Kath Hound and Iriaz

Creatures of KOTOR 2: Horned Kath Hound and Iriaz was an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on January 15, 2009 and was the second in the series of web enhancements, which present information on creatures that that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article gave information on the Kath hound and Iriaz, two creatures from Dantooine.
